anya-e1205n0:7_0: Tattha tikkhattumagamā nātho’ti anamatagge saṁsāravaṭṭe parināmetvā appatisaraṇabhāvappattānaṁ
anya-e1205n0:7_1: lokiyalokuttarasukhanipphādanabhāvena nātho patisaraṇa bhūto bhagavā buddhadhammasaṅgharatanattayamaggaṁ
anya-e1205n0:7_2: ācikkhanto laṅkādīpaṁ tikkhattuṁ gato. Tattha paṭhamagamane tāva bodhimaṇḍaṁ āruyha
anya-e1205n0:7_3: puratthīmābhimukho nisīditvā sūriye anatthamiteyeva mārabalaṁ vidhametvā, paṭhamayāme
anya-e1205n0:7_4: pubbenivāsañāṇaṁ anussaritvā majjhimayāme cutupapātañāṇaṁ patvā pacchimayāmāvasāne
anya-e1205n0:7_5: paccayākāre ñāṇaṁ otāretvā dasabalacatuvesārajjādi guṇapatimaṇḍitaṁ sabbaññutañāṇaṁ
anya-e1205n0:7_6: paṭivijjhitvā bodhimaṇḍappadese anukkamena sattasattāhaṁ vītināmetvā aṭṭhame sattāhe
anya-e1205n0:7_7: ajapālanigrodhamūle nisinno dhammagambhirataṁ paccavekkhanena appossukkataṁ āpajjamāno
anya-e1205n0:7_8: dasasahassa brahmaparivārena sahampatimahābrahmunā āyācitadhammadesano hutvā buddhacakkhunā
anya-e1205n0:7_9: lokaṁ olokento pañcavaggiyānaṁ bhikkhunaṁ bahūpakārakaṁ anussaritvā uṭṭhāyāsanā kāsīnaṁ
anya-e1205n0:7_10: puraṁ gantvā aññākoṇaḍaññappamukhe aṭṭhārasa brahmakoṭiyo amataṁ pāyento dhammacakkaṁ
anya-e1205n0:7_11: pavattetvā pakkhassa pañcamiyaṁ pañcavaggiye sabbepi te arahante patiṭṭhāpetvā taṁ
anya-e1205n0:7_12: divasameva yasakulaputtassa rattibhāge sotāpattiphalaṁ datvā punadivase arahantaṁ
anya-e1205n0:7_13: datvā tassa sahāyake catupaññāsajane arahantaṁ pāpetvā evaṁ loke ekasaṭṭhiyā arahantesu
anya-e1205n0:7_14: jātesu vutthavasso pavāretvā, ‘caratha bhikkhave cārika’ nti bhikkhu disāsu pesetvā
anya-e1205n0:7_15: sayaṁ uruvelaṁ gacchanto antarāmagge kappāsikavanasaṇḍe bhaddavaggiye kumāre tiṁsajane
anya-e1205n0:7_16: vinetvā ehibhikkhubhāvena pabbājetvā uruvelaṁ gantvā aḍḍhuḍḍhāni pāṭihāriyasahassāni
anya-e1205n0:7_17: dassento uruvelakassapādayo sahassajaṭilaparivāre tebhātikajaṭile vinento tattheva
anya-e1205n0:7_18: vihāsi. Aparabhāge aṅgamagadharaṭṭhavāsino uruvelakassapassa mahāyaññaṁ upaṭṭhāpesuṁ.
anya-e1205n0:7_19: So pana icchācārābhibhūto cintesi? “Sacāyaṁ mahāsamaṇo imassa samāgamassa majjhe
anya-e1205n0:7_20: pāṭihāriyaṁ kareyya lābhasakkāro me parihāyissati”ti. Tassevaṁ pavattaajjhāsayaṁ
anya-e1205n0:7_21: ñatvā pātova uttarakuruto bhikkhaṁ āharitvā anotatte āhāraṁ paribhuñjitvā sāyanha
anya-e1205n0:8_0: Tassa pana dīpassa mahāgaṅgāya dakkhiṇapasse āyāmato tiyojane puthulato ekayojanappamāṇe
anya-e1205n0:8_1: mahānāgavanuyyāne yakkhasamāgamassa majjhe tassa upari mahiyaṅgaṇathūpassa patiṭṭhānaṭṭhāne
anya-e1205n0:8_2: ākāseyeva ṭhīto vuṭṭhivātandhakāraṁ dassetvā tesaṁ bhayaṁ uppādesi. Te bhayena upaddutā
anya-e1205n0:8_3: “kassa nu kho imaṁ kamma”nti ito cito olokento addasaṁsu bhagavantaṁ ākāse nisinnaṁ.
anya-e1205n0:8_4: Disvāna bhagavantaṁ abhayaṁ yāviṁsu. Tesaṁ bhagavā āha?
anya-e1205n0:9_0: “Sace tumhe abhayaṁ icchatha mayhaṁ nisajjaṭṭhānassa okāsaṁ dethā”ti. Sabbepi te
anya-e1205n0:9_1: tassa nisajjaṭṭhānaṁ adaṁsu. Bhagavā nisajjāya okāsaṁ gahetvā tesaṁ bhayaṁ vinodetvā
anya-e1205n0:9_2: tehi dinne bhumibhāge cammakhaṇḍaṁ pattharitvā nisīdi. Nisinnova pana bhagavā cammakhaṇḍaṁ
anya-e1205n0:9_3: pasāresi. Te yakkhā bhītatasitā aññattha gantuṁ asahamānā samantato sāgaratīre rāsibhūtā
anya-e1205n0:9_4: ahesuṁ. Satthā giridīpaṁ iddhānubhāvena āharitvā dassesi. Tesu tattha patiṭṭhitesu
anya-e1205n0:9_5: puna yathāṭṭhāneva ṭhapetvā pattharitacammakhaṇḍampi saṁkhipi. Tasmiṁ khaṇe tato
anya-e1205n0:9_6: tato devā sannipatiṁsu. Tesaṁ samāgame dhammaṁ desesi. Anekesaṁ pāṇakoṭīnaṁ dhammābhisamayo
anya-e1205n0:9_7: ahosi. Saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhitā asaṅkheyyā ahesuṁ. Sumanakūṭe pana mahāsumanadevo
anya-e1205n0:9_8: sotāpattiphalaṁ patvā attano pūjanīyaṁ bhagavantaṁ yāci. Bhagavā tena yācito sīsaṁ
anya-e1205n0:9_9: pāṇinā parāmasitvā kesadhātuṁgahetvā tassa adāsi. Datvā ca pana laṅkādīpaṁ tikkhattuṁ
anya-e1205n0:9_10: padakkhiṇaṁ katvā parittaṁ katvā ārakkhaṁ saṁvidhāya puna uruvelameva āgato. So pana
anya-e1205n0:9_11: kesadhātuyo suvaṇṇacaṅgoṭakenādāya satthu nisinnaṭṭhāne nānāratanehi vicittaṁ thūpaṁ
anya-e1205n0:9_12: patiṭṭhāpetvā upari indanīlamaṇithūpikāhi pidahitvā gandhamālādīhi pūjento vihāsi.
anya-e1205n0:9_13: Parinibbute pana bhagavati sāriputtassa antevāsiko sarabhū nāma thero khīṇāsavo citakato
anya-e1205n0:9_14: iddhiyā tathāgatassa gīvaṭṭhiṁ ādāya tasmiṁ indanīlamaṇithūpe patiṭṭhāpetvā meghavaṇṇapāsāṇehi
anya-e1205n0:9_15: dvādasahatthaṁ thūpaṁ kārāpetvā gato. Tato devānampiyatissarañño bhātā cūḷābhayo
anya-e1205n0:9_16: nāma kumāro tamabbhutaṁ cetiyaṁ disvā abhippasanno taṁ paṭicchādento tiṁsahatthaṁ
anya-e1205n0:9_17: cetiyaṁ patiṭṭhāpesi. Puna duṭṭhagāmaṇī abhayamahārājā taṁ paṭicchādetvā asītihatthaṁ
anya-e1205n0:9_18: kañcukacetiyaṁ kārāpesi. Mahiyaṅgaṇa thūpassa patiṭṭhānādhikāro evaṁ vitthārato veditabbo?
anya-e1205n0:12: Tato pubbuttare ṭhatvā pallaṅkā īsake jino
anya-e1205n0:15: Vicinitvā jino dhammaṁ varaṁ so ratanāghare.
anya-e1205n0:20: Catuhi lokapālehi silāpattaṁ samāhaṭaṁ catukkamekakaṁ katvā adhiṭṭhānena nāyako.
anya-e1205n0:22: Tahiṁ pana gahetvāna bhattakiccaṁ akā jino.
anya-e1205n0:24: Saraṇaṁ agamuṁ te taṁ satthu dinnasiroruhā.
anya-e1205n0:25: Gantvāna te sakaṁ raṭṭhaṁ thūpaṁ katvā manoramaṁ
anya-e1205n0:33: Patto pāṭipade vappo bhaddiyo dutiye phalaṁ,
anya-e1205n0:34: Tatiye ca mahānāmo assajī ca catutthīyaṁ.
anya-e1205n0:41: Taṁ taṁ damī jino nāgaṁ damanena urādigaṁ,
anya-e1205n0:51: Yakkhe damitvā sambuddho dhātuṁ datvāna nāyako,
anya-e1205n0:52: Gantvāna uruvelaṁ so vasī tattha vane jino.
anya-e1205n0:54_0: Dutiyagamane pana bodhito pañcame vasse jetavanamahāvihāre vasanto cūḷodara’mahodarānaṁ
anya-e1205n0:54_1: mātulabhāgineyyānaṁ nāgānaṁ maṇipallaṅkaṁ nissāya saṅgāmaṁ paccupaṭṭhitaṁ disvā sayaṁ
anya-e1205n0:54_2: pattacīvaramādāya cittamāsassa kāḷapakkhe uposathadivase nāgadīpaṁ gantvā tesaṁ saṅgāmamajjhe
anya-e1205n0:54_3: ākāse nisinno andhakāraṁ akāsi. Te andhakārābhibhūte samassāsetvā ālokaṁ dassetvā
anya-e1205n0:54_4: attano saraṇabhūtānaṁ tesaṁ sāmaggikaraṇatthaṁ phalabharitarukkhaṁ cālento viya dhammaṁ
anya-e1205n0:54_5: desesi. Te ubhopi dhamme pasīditvā tampi pallaṅkaṁ tathāgatassa adaṁsu. Bhagavā pallaṅke
anya-e1205n0:54_6: nisinno dibbannapānehi santappito bhattānumodanaṁ katvā asītikoṭiyo nāge saraṇesu
anya-e1205n0:54_7: ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhāpesi. Tasmiṁ samāgame mahodarassa mātulo maṇiakkhiko nāma nāgarājā
anya-e1205n0:54_8: bhagavantaṁ puna kalyāṇidesamāgamanatthaṁ. Ayāci. Bhagavā pana tuṇhībhāvena adhivāsetvā “jetavanameva gato.
anya-e1205n0:60_0: Tatiyagamane pana bodhito aṭṭhame vasse jetavanamahāvihāre viharanto bhagavā? “Mama
anya-e1205n0:60_1: parinibbānato pacchā tambapaṇṇidīpe sāsanaṁ patiṭṭhahissati, so dīpo bahu bhikkhubhikkhunīupāsakopāsikādi
anya-e1205n0:60_2: ariyagaṇasevito kāsāvapajjoto bhavissati, mayhaṁ catunnaṁ dāṭhādhātunaṁ antare ekā
anya-e1205n0:60_3: dāṭhā ca dakkhiṇaakkhadhātu ca nalāṭadhātu ca rāmagāmavāsīhi laddho ekakoṭṭhāso ca
anya-e1205n0:60_4: aññe bahusarīradhātu ca kesadhātuyo ca tattheva patiṭṭhahissanti anekāni saṅghārāmasahassāni
anya-e1205n0:60_5: ca. Buddhadhammasaṅgharatane patiṭṭhitasaddho mahājano bhavissati. Tasmā laṅkādīpaṁ
anya-e1205n0:60_6: gantvā tattha samāpattiṁ samāpajjitvā āgantuṁ vaṭṭatī “ti cintetvā ānandattheraṁ
anya-e1205n0:60_8: paṭivedesi. Amhehi saddhiṁ gantabba “nti. Ānandatthero kapilavatthukoḷiya nagaravāsīnaṁ
anya-e1205n0:60_9: pañcasatamahākhīṇāsavānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ paṭivedesi. Te paṭiveditā pañcasatakhīṇāsavā
anya-e1205n0:60_10: pattacīvaradhārā hutvā satthāraṁ vanditvā añjaliṁ paggayha namassamānā aṭṭhaṁsu.
anya-e1205n0:60_11: Satthuno pana salalāya nāma gandhakuṭiyā avidūre rattasetanīluppalakumudapadumapuṇḍarīkasatapattasahassapattajalajehi
anya-e1205n0:60_14: susajjitabhūmipadesā accantaramaṇiyā pokkharaṇī atthi. Tattha adhivattho mahānubhāvo
anya-e1205n0:60_15: sumanonāma nāgarājā soḷasasahassamattāhi nāgamāṇavikāhi parivuto mahantaṁ sirisampattiṁ
anya-e1205n0:60_16: anubhavamāno tathāgatassa rūpasobhaggappattaṁ attabhāvaṁ oloketvā mahantaṁ sukhasomanassaṁ
anya-e1205n0:60_17: anubhavamāno attano mātaraṁ nandanāgamānavikaṁ garuṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā tassā veyyāvaccaṁ
anya-e1205n0:60_18: kurumāno tasmiṁyeva pokkharaṇiṁ ajjhāvasati. Satthā pana attano gamanaṁ saṁvidhānānantare
anya-e1205n0:60_19: sumanaṁ nāgarājānaṁ avidure ṭhitaṁ āmantetvā saparivāro āgacchā hīti āha. So sādhuti
anya-e1205n0:60_20: sampaṭicchitvā attano parivāre chakoṭimatte nāge gahetvā supuppītacampakarukkhaṁ
anya-e1205n0:60_21: tathāgatassa sūriyaraṁsinivāraṇatthaṁ chattaṁ katvā gaṇhi. Atha bhagavā ravirasmipatthaṭasuvaṇṇapabbato
anya-e1205n0:60_22: viya virocamāno attano pattacīvaramādāya ākāsaṁ abbhūggañchi. Satthāraṁ parivāretvā
anya-e1205n0:60_23: ṭhītā te pañcasatakhīṇāsavāpi sakaṁ sakaṁ pattacīvaramādāya ākāsaṁ uggantvā satthāraṁ
anya-e1205n0:60_25: gantvā mahārahe maṇḍapamajjhe paññattavara buddhāsane pañcasatakhīṇāsavaparivuto hutvā nisīdi.
anya-e1205n0:61_0: Atha maṇiakkhiko nāma nāgarājā buddhapamukhaṁ bhikkhu saṅghaṁ anekehi dibbehi khajjabhojjehi
anya-e1205n0:61_1: santappetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Satthā tassa bhattānumodanaṁ katvā sumanakuṭe padalañchanaṁ
anya-e1205n0:61_2: dassetvā tasmiṁ pabbatapāde anekapādapākiṇṇabhūmippadese nisinno divāvihāraṁ katvā
anya-e1205n0:61_3: tato vuṭṭhāya dīghavāpicetiyaṭṭhāne samāpattiṁ samāpajji. Mahāpathavī udakapariyantaṁ
anya-e1205n0:61_4: katvā satavāraṁ sahassavāraṁ saṅkampi. Tattha mahāsenaṁ nāma devaputtaṁ ārakkhatthāya
anya-e1205n0:61_5: nivattetvā tato vuṭṭhāya mahāthūpaṭṭhāne tatheva samāpattiṁ samāpajji. Mahāpathavi
anya-e1205n0:61_6: tatheva kampi. Tatrāpi visālarūpa devaputtaṁ ārakkhaṁ gaṇhanatthāya ṭhapetvā tato
anya-e1205n0:61_7: vuṭṭhāya thūpārāma cetiyaṭṭhāne tatheva nirodhasamāpattiṁ samāpajji. Mahāpathavī
anya-e1205n0:61_8: tatheva kampi. Tattha ca pathavipāla devaputtaṁ ārakkhatthāya. Nivattetvā tato vuṭṭhāya
anya-e1205n0:61_9: maricavaṭṭicetiyaṭṭhānaṁ gantvā pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṁ samāpattiṁ appayi.
anya-e1205n0:61_10: Pathavi tatheva kampi. Tasmiṁ ṭhāne indakadevaputtaṁ ārakkhaṁ gaṇhanatthāya ṭhapesi.
anya-e1205n0:61_11: Tato vuṭṭhāya kācaragāmacetiyaṭṭhāne tatheva samāpattiṁ samāpajji. Pathavi tatheva
anya-e1205n0:61_12: kampi. (Tasmiṁ ṭhāne mahāghosa devaputtaṁ ārakkhaṁ gaṇhanatthāya niyyādesi) etasmiṁ
anya-e1205n0:61_13: mahācetiyaṭṭhāne mahāghosaṁ nāma devaputtaṁ ārakkhaṁ gahaṇatthāya nivattetvā tato
anya-e1205n0:61_14: vuṭṭhāya tissamahāvihāracetiyaṭṭhāne tatheva samāpattiṁ samāpajji. Pathavi tatheva
anya-e1205n0:61_15: kampi. Tattha maṇimekhalaṁ nāma devadhītaraṁ ārakkhaṁ gāhāpetvā tato nāgamahāvihāracetiyaṭṭhāne
anya-e1205n0:61_16: tatheva samāpattiṁ samāpajji. Pathavi tatheva kampi. Tasmimpi mahindaṁ nāma devaputtaṁ
anya-e1205n0:61_17: ārakkhaṁ gahaṇatthāya ṭhapesi. Tato vuṭṭhāya mahāgaṅgāya dakkhiṇadisābhāge seru nāma
anya-e1205n0:61_18: dahassa ante varāha nāma soṇḍimatthake atimanoramaṁ udakabubbuḷakelāsakūṭapaṭibhāgaṁ
anya-e1205n0:61_19: cetiyaṁ patiṭṭhahissatī’ti pañcasatakhīṇāsavehi saddhiṁ nirodhasamāpattiṁ samāpajji.
anya-e1205n0:61_21: kuñcanādakaraṇaṁ viya ucchukoṭṭana yanta-mukhasaddo viya (ca) satavāraṁ sahassavāraṁ
anya-e1205n0:61_22: nadamānā somanassappattā viya sakalalaṅkādīpaṁ unnādaṁ kurumānā saṁkampi. Tato vuṭṭhāya
anya-e1205n0:61_23: sumananāgarañño hatthesu ṭhita campakarukkhato pupphāni ādāya tattha pūjetvā punappunaṁ
anya-e1205n0:61_24: taṁ olokesi. So satthāraṁ vanditvā mayā bhante kiṁ kattabbanti pucchi. Imassa ṭhānassa
anya-e1205n0:61_25: ārakkhaṁ karohīti āha. So taṁ sutvā bhante tumhākaṁ gandhakuṭiṁ mama ārakkhaṁ karontassa
anya-e1205n0:61_27: dassanānuttariyabhūtaṁ passantassa manosilātale sīhanādaṁ nadanto taruṇasīho viya
anya-e1205n0:61_28: gajjanto pāvussakamahāmegho viya ākāsagaṅgaṁ otaranto viya ratanadāmaṁ ganthento
anya-e1205n0:61_29: viya ca aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṁ savanīyasaraṁ vissajjetvā bramhaghosaṁ nicchārento nānānayehi
anya-e1205n0:61_31: madhura dhammadesanaṁ suṇantassa, ñāṇiddhiyā koṭippatte sāriputtamoggallānādayo asītimahāsāvake
anya-e1205n0:61_32: passantassa, tattheva mayhaṁ vasanaṁ ruccati. Na sakkomi aññattha tumhehi vinā vasitunti
anya-e1205n0:61_33: āha. Bhagavā tassa kathaṁ sutvā nagarāja, imaṁ padesaṁ tayā ciraṁ vasitaṭṭhānaṁ.
anya-e1205n0:61_34: Kakusandhassa bhagavato dhātu imasmiṁyeva ṭhāne patiṭṭhitā, tvameva tasmiṁ kāle varaniddo
anya-e1205n0:61_35: nāma nāgarājā hutvā tassā dhātuyā ārakkhaṁ gahetvā gandhamālādīhi pūjaṁ karonto ciraṁ
anya-e1205n0:61_36: vihāsi. Puna koṇāgamanassa bhagavato dhātu imasmiṁyeva ṭhāne patiṭṭhitā tvameva tasmiṁ
anya-e1205n0:61_37: kāle jayaseno nāma devaputto hutvā tassā dhātuyā ārakkhaṁ gahetvā gandhamālādīhi
anya-e1205n0:61_38: pūjaṁ katvā tattheva ciraṁ vihāsi. Puna kassapassa bhagavato dhātu imasmiṁyeva ṭhāne
anya-e1205n0:61_39: patiṭṭhitā. Tvameva tasmiṁ kāle dīghasālo nāma nāgarājā hutvā tāya dhātuyā ārakkhaṁ
anya-e1205n0:61_40: gahetvā gandhamālādīhi pūjaṁ karonto vihāsi. Mayi pana parinibbute kākavaṇṇatissamahārājā
anya-e1205n0:61_41: mayhaṁ nalāṭadhātuṁ imasmiṁyeva ṭhāne patiṭṭhāpessati, tasmā tvaṁ imassa ṭhānassa
anya-e1205n0:61_42: ārakkhaṁ karohīti vatvā pañcasīlesu patiṭṭhāpetvā pañcasatakhīṇāsavehi saddhiṁ cetiyaṭṭhānaṁ
anya-e1205n0:61_43: padakkhiṇaṁ katvā tvaṁ appamatto hohīti vatvā ākāsaṁ uppatitvā jetavanameva gato.
anya-e1205n0:62_0: Tassa pana nāgarañño mātā indamānavikā nāma āgantvā tathāgataṁ vanditvā ekamantaṁ
anya-e1205n0:62_1: ṭhitā, bhante mama putto sumano nāma nāgarājā kuhinti āha. Tava putto tambapaṇṇidīpe
anya-e1205n0:62_2: mahāvālukagaṅgāya dakkhiṇabhāge seru nāma dahassa samīpe varāha nāma soṇḍiyaṁ samādhi
anya-e1205n0:62_3: appitattā attano parivāre chakoṭimatte nāge gahetvā satthāraṁ vanditvā bhante ito
anya-e1205n0:62_4: paṭṭhāya tumhākaṁ dassanaṁ dullabhaṁ, khamatha meti accayaṁ desetvā mahatiṁ nāgasampattiṁ
anya-e1205n0:62_5: gahetvā puttassa sumananāgarājassa santikaṁ gantvā mahatiṁ issariyasampattiṁ anubhavanti
anya-e1205n0:66: Gantvā nāgavaraṁ dīpaṁ agā jetavanaṁ vidu.

anya-e1205n0:74: Puna gantvā nāgadīpaṁ agā jetavanaṁ varaṁ
